content.name: real_bounded
content.prop: real_bounded s ⟷ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B)

content.name: real_bounded_pos_lt

proof.th: ⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟶ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b))
∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B
⊢ _VAR y
∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ y ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ y
⊢ 0 < 1 + abs y

proof.args: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < 1 + abs y
proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ y ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < 1 + abs y
∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ y ⊢ 0 < 1 + abs y ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < 1 + abs y)

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λb. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b), a: 1 + abs y}
proof.th: ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ y ⊢ ∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b)
⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟶ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b))
⊢ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b)) ⟶ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B)

proof.args: ∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b)
proof.th: ∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b) ⊢ ∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b)
⊢ _VAR y

proof.args: 0 < y ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < y)
proof.th: 0 < y ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < y) ⊢ 0 < y ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < y)
0 < y ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < y) ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ y

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λB. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B, a: y}
proof.th: ∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b), 0 < y ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < y) ⊢ ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B

proof.args: ∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b)
proof.th: ⊢ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b)) ⟶ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B)
⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟷ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b))

proof.args: real_bounded_def, real_bounded s ⟷ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b))
proof.th: ⊢ real_bounded s ⟷ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b))
⊢ real_bounded s ⟷ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b))

content.prop: real_bounded s ⟷ (∃b. 0 < b ∧ (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x < b))

content.name: real_bounded_subset

proof.th: real_bounded t ⊢ real_bounded t
s ⊆ t ⊢ s ⊆ t
real_bounded t ⊢ ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B
s ⊆ t, real_bounded t ⊢ ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B
real_bounded t, s ⊆ t ⊢ real_bounded s
⊢ real_bounded t ⟶ s ⊆ t ⟶ real_bounded s

content.prop: real_bounded t ⟶ s ⊆ t ⟶ real_bounded s

content.name: real_bounded_union

proof.th: ⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟶ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ∧ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B)

proof.args: ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B
proof.th: ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B
⊢ _VAR B

proof.args: ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B
proof.th: ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B
∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B
⊢ _VAR x
x ∈ s ⊢ x ∈ s
x ∈ s ⊢ x ∈ s ∪ t
∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, x ∈ s ⊢ abs x ≤ B
∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B
∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B
∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ (∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B) ∧ (∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B)

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λx. (∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x), a: B}
proof.th: ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ ∃a. (∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ a) ∧ (∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ a)
∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B ⊢ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x)

proof.args: ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B
proof.th: ⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟶ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ∧ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B)
⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ∧ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟶ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B)

proof.args: (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x)
proof.th: (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ⊢ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x)

proof.args: conjD1, {}, {A: ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x, B: ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x}
proof.th: (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ⊢ ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x

proof.args: conjD2, {}, {A: ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x, B: ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x}
proof.th: (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ⊢ ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x
⊢ _VAR B1
∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B1 ⊢ ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B1
⊢ _VAR B2
∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B2 ⊢ ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B2

proof.args: ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ max B1 B2
proof.th: ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B2, ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B1 ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ max B1 B2

proof.args: exI, {a: real}, {P: λB. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B, a: max B1 B2}
proof.th: (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x) ∧ (∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x), ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B1, ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ B2 ⊢ ∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B

proof.args: ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ t ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x, ∃x. ∀x1. x1 ∈ s ⟶ abs x1 ≤ x
proof.th: ⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ∧ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟶ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B)
⊢ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ∪ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ⟷ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ abs x ≤ B) ∧ (∃B. ∀x. x ∈ t ⟶ abs x ≤ B)

proof.th: ⊢ real_bounded (s ∪ t) ⟷ real_bounded s ∧ real_bounded t
⊢ real_bounded (s ∪ t) ⟷ real_bounded s ∧ real_bounded t

content.name: reallim_trivial

proof.th: trivial_limit net ⊢ trivial_limit net
trivial_limit net ⊢ eventually (λx. false) net

⊢ _VAR e

trivial_limit net ⊢ ∀e. 0 < e ⟶ eventually (λx. abs (f x - l) < e) net
trivial_limit net ⊢ tendsto_real f l net
⊢ trivial_limit net ⟶ tendsto_real f l net
